name: Bella
description: Friendly and energetic, Bella loves outdoor activities and playing with children.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a playful and affectionate cat who loves cuddles and chasing toys.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is a gentle and curious rabbit who enjoys nibbling on fresh veggies.

name: Luna
description: Luna is an intelligent and active dog who loves running and solving puzzles.

name: Oliver
description: Oliver is a fluffy and gentle giant who enjoys lounging in the sun.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a calm and friendly dog who loves belly rubs and short walks.

name: Cleo
description: Cleo is a highly intelligent parrot who loves to mimic sounds and interact with people.

name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a loving and loyal dog who enjoys playing fetch and swimming.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a sweet and playful bunny who enjoys hopping around and exploring.

name: Max
description: Max is a highly trainable and protective dog, perfect for an active family.
